body:
Nah, probably won't. This scratched an itch and the barrier to contribute
was so low via github.
On 6 Apr 2015 2:51 pm, "Mikio Hara" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Sorry, we don't accept pull requests.
>
> Please see https://golang.org/doc/contribute.html and send a Gerrit CL
> instead.
